text: Sugbon awon agba ninu imo ninu won ati awon onigbagbo ododo, won gbagbo ninu ohun ti A sokale fun o ati ohun ti A sokale siwaju re, (won tun gbagbo ninu awon molaika) t’o n kirun. (Awon wonyen) ati awon t’o n yo Zakah ati awon t’o gbagbo ninu Allahu ati Ojo Ikeyin, awon wonyen ni A maa fun ni esan nla
